activities: RUN collects personal data from individuals in the European Union through its website and, on behalf of its clients, through its advertising technology and transfers it to the United States for the following purposes: (1) to provide advertising services to its clients, (2) to operate its website, (3) to respond to requests sent through its website, and (4) to manage opt-out requests.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client personal data and end user personal data
